title: IRenderMaterial.PrimaryColor
description: Gets or sets the primary color of the appearance.
remarks:
This property corresponds to the
Current
Color 1
control on the Color/Image tab of the Appearances PropertyManager page.
To get or set:
Current Color 2
, call
IRenderMaterial::SecondaryColor
.
Current Color 3
, call
IRenderMaterial::TertiaryColor
.
